### Visualizations

Include relevant diagrams, charts, or images to enhance understanding.

```{python}
#| label: fig-visualization
#| fig-cap: "Caption describing what this figure shows"
#| fig-alt: "Alternative text for accessibility"
#| echo: false

# Code to generate visualization
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Example plot
x = np.linspace(0, 10, 100)
y = np.sin(x)

plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
plt.plot(x, y, linewidth=2)
plt.title("Example Visualization")
plt.xlabel("X-axis label")
plt.ylabel("Y-axis label")
plt.grid(True, alpha=0.3)
plt.show()
```
